  • Method Details

    • kappaText

      public double kappaText​(java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double> treeMap, float length)
      Returns the kappa value of the monogram analysed text.
      Parameters:
      treeMap - A pre-created map of all monograms (ie. letters) in the text and the respective fractions of the whole they make up.
      length - Integer length of the text being analysed.
      Returns:
      The kappa value of the text.

    • indexOfCoincidence

      public float indexOfCoincidence​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> letters)
      Returns the true index of coincidence of analysed text.
      Parameters:
      letters - A map of letters and their integer occurrences within text.
      Returns:
      A float.

    • peroidicIndexOfCoincidence

      public double[] peroidicIndexOfCoincidence​(java.lang.String text)
      Returns an array of the indices of coincidence for nth letters in the text starting at 2.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to be analysed.
      Returns:
      An array of nth letter IOC scores.

    • periodIndexOfCoincidence

      public double periodIndexOfCoincidence​(int length, java.lang.String text)
      Calculates the sum of the indices of coincidence for each period for a given key length.
      Parameters:
      length - The key length to be analysed.
      text - The text to be analysed.
      Returns:
      The sum of the indices of coincidence for the text.
